squidpony.squidgrid.gui.awt.event

Class SGMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.awt.event.SGMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public class SGMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
    This mouse listener allows for easy interface with a grid based system. This class covers all aspects of mouse movement and clicking, but not mouse wheel events This class is meant to be used as a wrapper to your own mouse listener, it simply converts the coordinates from UI Component x,y to Grid based x,y
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SGMouseListener(int cellWidth, int cellHeight, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener listener)
      Sets the size of the cell so that all mouse input can be evaluated as relative to the grid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SGMouseListener

        public SGMouseListener(int cellWidth,
               int cellHeight,
               javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener listener)
        Sets the size of the cell so that all mouse input can be evaluated as relative to the grid. All input is passed to the provided listener once it has had its coordinates translated to grid coordinates.
        Parameters:
        cellWidth -
        cellHeight -
